name: modis_lst_day_monthly
title: Daytime Land surface temperature - MODIS
description: Monthly daytime land surface temperature. Created using MOD11C3 Monthly CMG LST
details: Created by extracting monthly daytime land surface temperature data from hdf

extract_types_info.max: maximum land surface temperature value per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.mean: average land surface temperature value per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.min: minimum land surface temperature value per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis

extras.citation: Wan, Z., Hook, S., Hulley, G. (2015). MOD11C3 MODIS/Terra Land Surface Temperature/Emissivity Monthly L3 Global 0.05Deg CMG V006 [Data set]. NASA EOSDIS LP DAAC. doi: 10.5067/MODIS/MOD11C3.006
extras.sources_name: Land Processes Distributed Active Archive Center
